location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No 27 of 1822 from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Bombay Government that the Resident has received intelligence from Katife [Al-Qaṭīf] and a letter from Shaikh Manjed [Shaikh Manjid], Chief of the Beni Khaled Arabs. The intelligence concerns Turkish reinforcements sent to the Arabian side of the Persian Gulf and Iraq; it is noted that the reinforcements are under the command of Hossain Pasha [Ḥussayn Pāshā].
